attributes.action: Declare the result of the UK Referendum on the European Union as null and void.
attributes.additional_details: The Leave campaign perpetuated a blisteringly arrogant false advertising campaign, with no plan in place to carry out their promises.  Our country is being held to ransom as a result.  We cannot let this stand, and call for the result to be declared null and void, based as it was on lies and propaganda.
attributes.background: People voted to leave the EU on the basis of promises already broken, such as "£350m for the NHS" & "reduction of immigration to the UK."  Promises were made by campaign leaders knowing they were not the whole truth, but would strongly influence British voters unable to research facts themselves.
